title: League Bug Splats Whenever Attempting to Start a Game.
body: Alright, so every time I try to get into a game, League bug splats, tries to repair itself, then tells me an unknown error occurs (Code: 004), then restarts itself, finishes the repair, but when I try to get into another game, the process repeats. Reinstalling LoL only works for a couple of games, and the problem occurs again. Could someone please help me, please.

replies.body: Sorry, I forgot to mention, I'm using windows 8.

If you're running specifically Windows 8 and not 8.1, you'll definitely want to install the [**8.1 update package**](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/15356/windows-8-install-update-kb-2919355). There are a number of issues that happen on outdated copies of Windows 8 that can be resolved by just updating to 8.1.

If you continue to experience these bugsplats, let me know which directory you have League installed to. The default directory is listed below, so if you have files there, you've installed League to the default directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**
